thread.section_title: Leibish & Co. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Leibish & Co. | leibish.com
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text:
i would recommend Leibish and Co unreservedly be it my family, friends or the internet community.
My first point of contact was Mali, whom was professional and patient through the entire process. Delivery was within the 22 day guarantee, on arrival the custom made ring was breathtakingly beautiful.
i have no reservations in recommending Leibish and co. i now consider a leader in the fine jewellery industry.
